title: IView.CropViewJaggedOutline
description: Gets or sets whether to use a jagged outline in this cropped drawing view.
returns: True to use a jagged outline, false to not (see Remarks )
remarks:
Call
IView::IsCropped
to find out if this drawing view is cropped.
IView::CropViewJaggedOutline is only available when
IView::CropViewNoOutline
is false.
To set the intensity of the jagged outline, call
IView::CropViewJaggedShapeIntensity
.
